title: Collaboration Task Created
description: Fired when a task is created in a collaborative workspace.

workspaceId.description: The unique identifier of the workspace the task belongs to.

projectId.description: The unique identifier of the project the task belongs to.

title.description: The title or name of the task.

assigneeId.description: The unique identifier of the user assigned to the task.

priority.description: The priority level of the task.

dueDate.description: The due date and time for the task in ISO 8601 format.

labels.description: Labels or tags applied to the task.
